titles.title: A bill for the relief of Richard M. Sakakida.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12381-12384)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 8/23/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to review the military records of a named individual to determine whether the award of a medal for heroism for action in the Philippines during World War II is appropriate.
